mapper.select: select * from page_order where is_del = 0 and page_code = #{pageOrderCode};
select * from page_order where competition_code = #{competitionCode} and is_del = 0
select * from page_order where competition_code = #{competitionCode} and page_status = 'yks' and is_del = 0

update page_order
page_code = #{pageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page_status = #{pageStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
